studio-ghibli-movies.title: Spirited Away
studio-ghibli-movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
studio-ghibli-movies.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
studio-ghibli-movies.description: Sophie finds her life changed when she is literally swept off her feet by the handsome, mysterious wizard Howl. In search of a cure to a witch’s curse, Sophie boards his magnificent moving castle into a new life of wonder and adventure.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Castle in the Sky
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Ponyo
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Princess Mononoke
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A prince becomes involved in the struggle between a forest princess and the encroachment of mechanization.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Porco Rosso
studio-ghibli-movies.description: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind
studio-ghibli-movies.description: Far in the future, after an apocalyptic conflict has devastated much of the world's ecosystem, the few surviving humans live in scattered semi-hospitable environments within what has become a toxic jungle. Young Nausicaä lives in the arid Valley of the Wind and can communicate with the massive insects that populate the dangerous jungle. Under the guidance of the pensive veteran warrior, Lord Yupa, Nausicaä works to bring peace back to the ravaged planet.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Tales From Earthsea
studio-ghibli-movies.description: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Ocean Waves
studio-ghibli-movies.description: The arrival of a pretty transfer student from Tokyo sets in motion a change in the relationship between two best friends.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Arrietty
studio-ghibli-movies.description: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Pom Poko
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: From Up on Poppy Hill
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
studio-ghibli-movies.description: The life and misadventures of a family in contemporary Japan.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: The Cat Returns
studio-ghibli-movies.description: High school student Haru rescues a cat that was about to be run over by a truck and discovers the cat is actually a prince named Lune. Out of gratitude, Lune's father, the Cat King, asks her to marry Lune. Haru is brought to the Cat Kingdom, where she starts to develop feline features.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A teenager is charged with the care of his younger sister after an Allied firebombing during World War II destroys their home and kills their mother.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Only Yesterday
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A put-upon 27-year-old Japanese office worker travels to the countryside and reminisces about her childhood in Tokyo and what life could have been.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: The Wind Rises
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A lifelong love of flight inspires Japanese aviation engineer Jiro Horikoshi, whose storied career includes the creation of the A-6M World War II fighter plane.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: Whisper of the Heart
studio-ghibli-movies.description: Based on the manga with the same title, this animated film follows Shizuku, an inquisitive young girl and a voracious reader, who longs to be a writer when she grows up. One day she notices that all of her library books have previously been taken out by one Seiji Amasawa. Amid chasing after a large cat, befriending an eccentric antiques dealer and writing her first novel, Shizuku aims to find this mysterious boy who may well be her soul mate.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: When Marnie Was There
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A tomboy explores a long-abandoned villa and meets a mysterious blonde girl only she can see.

studio-ghibli-movies.title: The Tale of Princess Kaguya
studio-ghibli-movies.description: A tiny nymph found inside a bamboo stalk grows into a beautiful and desirable young woman, who orders her suitors to prove their love by completing a series of near-impossible tasks.
